messages.id: ReserVe.Me is a place to find the perfect campsite on private property or the perfect place to list your private campsites.  We let you list publically or on an invite-only basis to members you invite.  You can define campsites via geofencing, upload pictures, pdfs and other assets associated with spots and create templates for easy re-use throughout your property
